name: ChickenZ: Remake
description:
You're a chicken. You don't know why you're here, and you can't remember how you got here. But you do know one thing:

Kill All Zombies.

You must kill any and all zombies. From simply chicken zombies, to unidentifiable creatures, you must fight your way to glory!

Go to hell itself, the zombie nest itself, or even the Z-Dimension! With a fun selection of areas, you can eradicate more and more zombies!

You choose yourself how you want to slay zombies. Fast-shooting machine guns? A slow-shooting sniper? How about transformed as a giant bird? Maybe using a gun that can switch between sniper and machine gun at any moment?

Boopdoop Discord Server: https://discord.gg/db2xN9m
